# OpenSeesDaysShanghai2011

A two-day workshop on OpenSees and OpenFresco.

May 29-30, 2011

Tongji University, Shanghai

Day 1 : Introduction to OpenSees

  1. Introduction to OpenSees & Tcl
  2. Basic Modeling By Example
  3. Nonlinear Analysis With Simple Examples
  4. OpenSees & Output
  5. Continuum Modeling With Geotechnical Emphasis
  6. Parallel & Distributd Processing

Day 2: Introduction to OpenFresco

exercise material: ShanghaiExamples.zip
